text: Tariq Aziz (1 July 1945 – 24 May 2014 ) was an Iraqi football striker who played for Iraq between 1967 and 1971. He also played for Al-Shorta. https://alshorta.webs.com/28.%20Tariq%20Aziz.pdf On 24 May 2014, Aziz died at the age of 68.https://www.alhurra.com/a/250261.html ==Career statistics== ===International goals=== Scores and results list Iraq's goal tally first. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:100%;" !
